amendment.description: To rename the death gratuity payable for deaths of members of the Armed Forces as fallen hero compensation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4219 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4219 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6353-6354) To rename the death gratuity payable for deaths of members of the Armed Forces as fallen hero compensation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4219 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4219 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Salazar.
